alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 1:24PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lackawanna and northeastern Luzerne Counties through 200 PM EST... At 123 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edwardsville, or over Wilkes-Barre, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Dunmore, Kingston, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston, Plymouth, Moosic and Exeter. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 164 and 182A and B. Interstate 84 between 8 and 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
